reviewText: The DVD captured the excitement of the race, with good photography and interviews. I am amazed how fast the riders go on regular streets. Amazon did a great job of getting the DVD quickly to me, well done.
If you are a fan of the TT you need this DVD. Excellent back stories and photography.
Very well done. Lots of footage of the actual event but good coverage of the human side as well

Worth every penny. The review coverage is perfect from start to finish. Since i don't have cable and I normally miss when there are streams of the TT, this is perfect. $20 to have all the races in HD to pause whenever I want? It's perfect. I loved this so much I went and grabbed 2015 too and will continue buying each year as an awesome collection. Would love to be there in person but $20 to feel like I'm there is good with me!
